3.eng-name: The Book of Menstruation and Istihadah

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah said:"While the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) was in the Masjid, he said: 'O 'Aishah, hand me the garment.' She said: 'I am not praying.' He said: 'It is not in your hand.' So she gave it to him

chapter.eng-name: Asking A Menstruating Woman To Do Something
